article_title: CVS Seeks Seniors, Specialty Pharmacy In $12.7B Omnicare Deal

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: In a deal that expands CVS Health’s presence in the rapidly growing specialty pharmacy and long-term care business, the drugstore giant said it would buy Omnicare (OCR) for $12.7 billion. The deal, which includes $98 per share in cash and assumption of $2.3 billion in debt gives CVS (CVS) 160 Omnicare [...]
